subject: Subject: Distribution of your products in Spain
description_text:
Hello,
I’m interested in distributing your products in Spain and would like to
know if you’re open to establishing a partnership. I believe your brand has
strong potential in the local Simracing market.
Could you please send me information about the requirements and conditions
to become a distributor?
Thank you in advance.

Best regards,
Andrea
DCsimracing@gmail.com

*SALUDOS *
*EQUIPO DCSIMRACING*

conversations.body_text: Hi DC Simracing,    We look forward to establishing a partnership with you. We are currently building our distributor network, and an excellent Spanish distributor is what we need.  Our main requirement for distributors in Spain is customer service quality. In addition, we will provide some corresponding requirements based on your needs. For example, there will be a minimum purchase requirement for exclusive distribution rights. What products do you need to sell?         Best regards, Simsonn

Hi,
We are interested in your pedals.... please send us your conditions and
prices... thanks

*SALUDOS *
*EQUIPO DCSIMRACING*

El jue, 7 ago 2025, 12:33, service@simsonn.com
Please check this table, and feel free to contact me if you need any other products.
